# Support Policy

## Supported Versions

| Branch | TrueNAS version | Supported with updates | Accepting Bugreports |
| ------- | ------- |------------------ | -------------- |
| `legacy_21.02ALPHA` | 21.02 ALPHA | :X: | :X: |
| MASTER | 21.04 ALPHA | :white_check_mark: | :white_check_mark: |
| MASTER | Nightly | :white_check_mark: | :white_check_mark: |
